data.title: Irvine Funeral Home
data.meta_description: At Irvine Memorial, we are a unique family owned funeral provider, blending the convenience of two funeral establishments, our own private crematorium and cemetery under one umbrella. This provides our clients with tremendous convenience and the knowledge that your loved one never leaves our care.
data.text:
Welcome

Welcome to irvinememorial.com. We are a unique family owned funeral provider, blending the convenience of two funeral establishments, our own private crematorium and cemetery under one umbrella. This provides our clients with tremendous convenience and the knowledge that your loved one never leaves our care.

Build Your Own Personalized Online Quote Now

Follow our Facebook page for weekly articles of interest on topics surrounding bereavement, remembrance pop culture, funeral customs and more.

Our funeral homes, cemetery and Crematorium are operated by Irvine Memorial Chapels & Cemetery Inc.
